languages.text: {n}Арджента отшатывается, как от удара, но затем делает шаг вперед, хватает культиста за загривок и заставляет посмотреть ей прямо в глаза, полыхающие, как уголья.{/n} "Я — одна из {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Адепта Сороритас{/g}. И я никогда, никогда в жизни не бежала от еретиков и предателей рода человеческого".

traits.locale_text: {n}Арджента отшатывается, как от удара, но затем делает шаг вперед, хватает культиста за загривок и заставляет посмотреть ей прямо в глаза, полыхающие, как уголья.{/n} "Я — одна из {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Адепта Сороритас{/g}. И я никогда, никогда в жизни не бежала от еретиков и предателей рода человеческого".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta recoils as if from a blow, but then steps forward, grabs the cultist by the scruff of his neck, and makes him look into her eyes, burning like embers.{/n} "I am one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. And I have never, not once in my life, fled from heretics and betrayers of Humankind."
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента отшатывается, как от удара, но затем делает шаг вперед, хватает культиста за загривок и заставляет посмотреть ей прямо в глаза, полыхающие, как уголья.{/n} "Я — одна из {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Адепта Сороритас{/g}. И я никогда, никогда в жизни не бежала от еретиков и предателей рода человеческого".

And I have never, not once in my life, fled from heretics and betrayers of humankind."

And I have never, not once in my life, fled from heretics and betrayers of Humankind."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔退了一步，仿佛挨了一击，但随后便走上前去，掐住了那个邪教徒的脖子。她死死地盯着他的双眼，眼神仿佛燃烧的余烬。{/n}“我是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修女会{/g}的成员，我这一生从来没有在异端分子与人类的叛徒面前临阵脱逃，一次都没有过。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta recoils as if from a blow, but then steps forward, grabs the cultist by the scruff of his neck, and makes him look into her eyes, burning like embers.{/n} "I am one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. And I have never, not once in my life, fled from heretics and betrayers of Humankind."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔退了一步，仿佛挨了一击，但随后便走上前去，掐住了那个邪教徒的脖子。她死死地盯着他的双眼，眼神仿佛燃烧的余烬。{/n}“我是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修女会{/g}的成员，我这一生从来没有在异端分子与人类的叛徒面前临阵脱逃，一次都没有过。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta recula, como si la hubieran golpeado, pero después da un paso al frente, agarra al sectario por el cuello y lo obliga a mirarle a unos ojos que arden como ascuas.{/n} «Soy miembro del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. Y nunca, jamás de los jamases, he huido de los herejes y los traidores a la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta recoils as if from a blow, but then steps forward, grabs the cultist by the scruff of his neck, and makes him look into her eyes, burning like embers.{/n} "I am one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. And I have never, not once in my life, fled from heretics and betrayers of Humankind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta recula, como si la hubieran golpeado, pero después da un paso al frente, agarra al sectario por el cuello y lo obliga a mirarle a unos ojos que arden como ascuas.{/n} «Soy miembro del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. Y nunca, jamás de los jamases, he huido de los herejes y los traidores a la Humanidad».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは殴られたかように一瞬たじろいだが、一歩前に出て、教団信者の首根っこをつかみ、燃えさかる炎のような己の目を見つめさせた。{/n}「我は{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修道聖女会{/g}の一員だ。そして我は、生涯において、異端者や人類への裏切り者から逃げたことは一度たりともない」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta recoils as if from a blow, but then steps forward, grabs the cultist by the scruff of his neck, and makes him look into her eyes, burning like embers.{/n} "I am one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. And I have never, not once in my life, fled from heretics and betrayers of Humankind."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは殴られたかように一瞬たじろいだが、一歩前に出て、教団信者の首根っこをつかみ、燃えさかる炎のような己の目を見つめさせた。{/n}「我は{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}修道聖女会{/g}の一員だ。そして我は、生涯において、異端者や人類への裏切り者から逃げたことは一度たりともない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta weicht wie von einem Schlag getroffen zurück, tritt dann aber wieder vor, packt den Kultisten am Genick und dreht ihn so, dass er ihr genau in die zornglühenden Augen blickt.{/n} "Ich gehöre zur {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. Und ich bin in meinem Leben noch nie vor Ketzern und Verrätern an der Menschheit geflohen."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta recoils as if from a blow, but then steps forward, grabs the cultist by the scruff of his neck, and makes him look into her eyes, burning like embers.{/n} "I am one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. And I have never, not once in my life, fled from heretics and betrayers of Humankind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta weicht wie von einem Schlag getroffen zurück, tritt dann aber wieder vor, packt den Kultisten am Genick und dreht ihn so, dass er ihr genau in die zornglühenden Augen blickt.{/n} "Ich gehöre zur {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. Und ich bin in meinem Leben noch nie vor Ketzern und Verrätern an der Menschheit geflohen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta recule comme si on venait de la frapper, mais elle se reprend immédiatement. Elle s'approche du cultiste, le saisit par le col et le force à la regarder dans ses yeux ardents comme des braises.{/n} « Je suis une sœur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. Jamais, pas une seule fois, je n'ai fui devant des hérétiques et des traîtres de l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta recoils as if from a blow, but then steps forward, grabs the cultist by the scruff of his neck, and makes him look into her eyes, burning like embers.{/n} "I am one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. And I have never, not once in my life, fled from heretics and betrayers of Humankind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta recule comme si on venait de la frapper, mais elle se reprend immédiatement. Elle s'approche du cultiste, le saisit par le col et le force à la regarder dans ses yeux ardents comme des braises.{/n} « Je suis une sœur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. Jamais, pas une seule fois, je n'ai fui devant des hérétiques et des traîtres de l'humanité. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ani bir darbe almışçasına geri sendeleyen Argenta, kendini toparlayıp öne doğru adım atıyor. Tarikatçıyı ensesinden kaptığı gibi âdeta alev alev yanan gözlerine bakmaya zorluyor.{/n} "Ben, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} mensubuyum. İnsanlığa sırtını dönen hainlerden ve kâfirlerin şerrinden hiç kaçmadım, kaçmam da."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta recoils as if from a blow, but then steps forward, grabs the cultist by the scruff of his neck, and makes him look into her eyes, burning like embers.{/n} "I am one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g}. And I have never, not once in my life, fled from heretics and betrayers of Humankind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ani bir darbe almışçasına geri sendeleyen Argenta, kendini toparlayıp öne bir adım atıyor. Tarikatçıyı ensesinden kaptığı gibi kendisine bakmaya zorluyor. Gözleri âdeta alev alev yanıyor.{/n} "Ben, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptaSororitas}Adepta Sororitas{/g} mensuplarından biriyim. İnsanlığa sırtını dönen hainlerden ve kâfirlerin şerrinden hiç kaçmadım, kaçmam da."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
